ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] running speed
ygData.msgSnippet: Geez, must be horrible being chained in front of your computer, *forced* to read messages you aren t interested in....  You poor thing.
ygData.messageBody:
Geez, must be horrible being chained in front of your computer,
*forced* to read messages you aren't interested in.... You poor
thing.

On Mon, 22 May 2000 13:00:26 -0500, you wrote:

>haha man, you took that persoanlly didnt you?
>for those who have a slow machine to really wanna wonder about running
>speeds, get your clarity, go to a shaman, and say
>"clarity for sow" it seems to work every time, and then you dont have to
>worry bout your machines speed.
>
>geeze, if you cant admit that dicussing computer stats in relation to
>running speed is a dumb thread, then you really out to examine your 2 cents
>worth.
>
>lets discuss casting time in relation to computer speed and particle density
>on "off", "low", Med", and "high"
>yea, that about the dumbness of this thread.
